idea-plugin.name: DevRhythm
idea-plugin.vendor: Dr. John Edwards — Utah State University
idea-plugin.description:
DevRhythm — Coding Rhythm & Idle Analytics

DevRhythm tracks coding activity, idle behavior, project engagement, and provides rich analytics for research in programming education.

Features:

  • Real-time coding activity tracking
  • Idle time detection and analysis
  • Project engagement metrics
  • Status bar widget with visual activity indicator for quick monitoring
  • Dedicated tool window for detailed analytics

Development Team:

Developed by Rubash Mali under the supervision of Dr. John Edwards at Utah State University.

Privacy Notice:

This plugin collects coding activity data for research purposes in programming education. Activity is measured with keystrokes and mouse clicks. Data is stored locally in a .devrhythm folder within each project.
